headline: PACCAR Targets Autonomous And Zero Emission Growth Under 2027 EPA Rules
summary: PACCAR (NasdaqGS:PCAR) is advancing autonomous freight through its partnership with Aurora Innovation, targeting a commercial launch of driverless technology in Q2 2026. The company is investing in zero-emission powertrains across its truck portfolio, aligning products with emerging demand for lower-emission freight solutions. PACCAR is adapting its product planning and technology roadmap to comply with and potentially benefit from the incoming 2027 EPA emissions standards. PACCAR, the...
